professional_summary: Experienced professional with expertise in Oracle database administration, software development, and Agile Scrum methodologies. Skilled in system migrations, testing, and process optimization.

key_responsibilities: Leading Agile transformations and coaching teams.
Optimizing workflows and managing project lifecycles with Jira.
Facilitating Agile ceremonies and implementing best practices.
Migrating systems and integrating new technologies.
Administering Oracle databases across PROD
DEV
and TEST environments.
Configuring and maintaining database backup and recovery processes.
Monitoring database performance using AWR
ASH
ADDM
and OEM tools.
Assisting IT analysts with technical issues.
Performing database administration tasks.
Conducting system migrations and integrations.
Testing software using various frameworks and tools.
Developing PL/SQL functions and procedures.
Installing and configuring Oracle RDBMs across PROD
DEV
and TEST environments.
Setting up high availability and disaster recovery solutions using ASM and RAC.
Tuning database performance through index optimization and query analysis.
Managing user permissions and security configurations.
Developing custom PL/SQL functions and scripts for data import/export.
Designing efficient database schemas and creating indexes.
Integrating third-party systems and applications.
Writing shell scripts for automated backup processes.
